QuestData.Title: Fair Exchange for a Soul
QuestData.Description:
While we work away here in the Conservatory, we must not forget to support the rest of the covenant.
I am needed here, but you can range far, even though your legs are short.
Please, help our covenant recover the anima we need. I can then dedicate my time to preparing another spirit for you to restore.
QuestData.RewardText:
You continue to serve the conservatory well. For this you have my thanks.
Now you may choose from the spirits I have collected myself for restoration.
